title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 5-28-2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 28, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls With Governors And Local Officials To Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 5-28-2009




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Vice President     __________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                 May 28, 2009 VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS:           Governor Felix Perez Camacho (R Guam)           Governor John deJongh, Jr. (D  Virgin Islands)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES:           Mayor Mufi Hannemann (D  Honolulu, HI)           Mayor Pam Iorio (D  Tampa, FL)          Mayor Curt Pringle (R  Anaheim, CA)          Mayor Mary Verner (D  Spokane, WA)          Mayor Antonio Villaraigosa (D  Los Angeles, CA)          County Commissioner Larry Emig (R  Osceola County, MI)          County Commissioner Rory Reid (D  Clark County, NV)  To date, the Vice President has hosted a total of 46 Governors and 66 Mayors/County Executives on conference calls to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. GOVERNORS Governor John Baldacci (D-ME) Governor Haley Barbour (R-MS) Governor Mike Beebe (D-AR) Governor Steve Beshear (D-KY) Governor Phil Bredesen (D-TN) Governor Jan Brewer (R-AZ) Governor Felix Perez Camacho (R-GU) Governor Don Carcieri (R-RI) Governor Jon Corzine (D-NJ) Governor Chet Culver (D-IA) Governor Mitch Daniels (R-IN) Lt.
